description: This Java class represents a data transfer object used as an envelope for broadcasting game events to subscribers. It includes properties for event type, game state, and metadata, and provides methods to set and get these properties as well as a static factory method.

classes.name: GameEventEnvelope
classes.description: A DTO class used to encapsulate and broadcast game events, including event type, game state, and metadata.

methods.name: getType
methods.description: Returns the type of the game event.

methods.name: setType
methods.description: Sets the type of the game event.

methods.name: getState
methods.description: Returns the current game state contained in the envelope.

methods.name: setState
methods.description: Sets the game state within the envelope.

methods.name: getMeta
methods.description: Returns the metadata map associated with the event.

methods.name: setMeta
methods.description: Sets the metadata map for the event.

methods.name: of
methods.description: Static factory method to create a new envelope with specified type, state, and room code included in metadata.
